name: This is not RPG
description: First of all, my English is very poor.I'm sorry.I really feel bad about that. I'm a keyboard man. The pursuit of happiness, the escape from pain is everything to me. There is no level at all. It's a person who is daydreaming all day and thinks the dream is pretty good. For me, the game is my second life....
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
